Hey, 

So I've had this bug recently that whenever I click on any research in the Research Tree at the Space Center it flickers the menu as if the mouse was spam clicking the research.

The same thing happens to me when I for example want to adjust the Precision Probe of an orbit, it spam clicks that input so that it increases say Prograde extremely fast until I click on the side.

Same thing with the Alarm clock, when I want to create one, it creates like 20 until I click on the side.

I don't have any auto clicker or other programs that could cause that. I have searched online but haven't found any fix for my issue, any help is much appreciated! thank you.
